mapper.select: SELECT id, tdate adate, t.tno tno, upno, gname name, t.gno gno, s.mno mno, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRANSACTION WHERE s.tno = upno) cnt FROM ( SELECT TNO, gno, t.MNO mno, id FROM TRANSACTION t, MEMBER m WHERE id = #{id} AND t.mno = m.mno AND upno is null ) s, TRANSACTION t, GOODS g WHERE s.tno = t.tno AND s.gno = g.gno ORDER BY TNO desc
SELECT g.gname name, g.gno gno FROM (select tno stno from transaction where tno = #{tno}) s, TRANSACTION t, goods g WHERE g.gno = t.gno and (upno like stno or tno like stno)
